author: dkhaywood
msg: fixing problem with drop-downs (choices) not working; also renamed OneToOneAssociation#getOptions() to #getChoices();   added Car.png to icons archetype.

author: dkhaywood
msg: changed FixturesFromConfiguration so that if no fixtures are loaded then just LOGs a warning, rather than failing completely

author: dkhaywood
msg: removed a coupla warnings from applib tests, is all.

author: dkhaywood
msg: ImperativeFacet can now wrap multiple methods, not just a single one; ImperativeFacetMulti added as a subinterface so that this can be determined easily; split up CallbackFacetFactory into multiple, and renamed SavedFacet to PeristedFacet etc; also genericized a bunch of classes (primarily Class -> Class<?>) to reduce number of warnings

author: dkhaywood
msg: simplified FixtureServices by removing the clock functionality and inlining directly within AbstractFixture; what remains is to do with switching user so renamed to SwitchUserService and renamed JavaFixtureServices to SwitchUserServiceImpl; simplified example app implementations accordingly
